hostname.description: The Terraform Enterprise hostname to connect to. Defaults to app.terraform.io.

ssl_skip_verify.description: Whether or not to skip certificate verifications.

token.description:
The token used to authenticate with Terraform Enterprise. We recommend omitting
the token which can be set as credentials in the CLI config file.

organization.description: The name of the Terraform Cloud organization that owns the workspace.

workspace.description: The name of the Terraform Cloud workspace to execute.
